name: platform-tools
description: A toolchain to build and compile native dependencies with and for Node.

scripts.doc: jsdoc2md lib/platform_tools.js > doc/API.md && node -e "const fs = require('fs');fs.writeFile('README.md', fs.readFileSync('doc/README.md'));['doc/README.md', 'doc/API.md', 'doc/LICENSE.md'].forEach(function(el){fs.appendFileSync('README.md',fs.readFileSync(el))})"
scripts.smoke-node: cd test/fixtures/sources/smoke/node && ./configure --no-target-type && make -j8 > pt_debug_log.txt && cd ../../../../../ && node test/smoke/node.js
scripts.smoke: npm run smoke-deps && npm run smoke-node
